title: Rio Ferdinand dramatically announces his return to football and agrees deal with Crystal Palace... sort of
text:
Rio Ferdinand dramatically announces his return to football and agrees deal with Crystal Palace... sort of If there was ever a day for this to happen... it would be transfer deadline day Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Rio Ferdinand jokes about coming out of retirement on deadline day Share this video   
Transfer deadline day is always capable of throwing up a surprise or three - but surely no one could have predicted this. 
In a dramatic turn of events, Rio Ferdinand has made a 'u-turn' on his retirement and punditry plans and is heading back to the Premier League. 
The former Manchester United defender posted the above video on his social media networks and in it announces he has agreed a deal with Sam Allardyce and Crystal Palace . 
A visibly excited Ferdinand claims he's been 'given the call' from Big Sam and that he's 'on his way'. "Turn the car round!" (Photo: Rio Ferdinand / Twitter) 
The 38-year-old then screams down the lens "see you in the Premier League people!" before cutting the transmission. 
Obviously it's all a joke poking fun at the big furore that is deadline day - at least we think it is... Follow all the action from transfer deadline day here. Read More
